en: Denying she was an anarchist, Katja maintained she wished only to make changes in our government, not to destroy it.

ko.text: 카티야는 자기가 아나키스트라는 걸 부정하면서, 정부를 파괴하려는 게 아니라 단지 변화시키고 싶을 뿐이라고 주장했어.

en: You met him at the university?

en: Yes, it happens from time to time.

en: People in the world are always advocating for more freedom and equality.

en: He was sick of being vilified all the time by people who were jealous of his ability.

zh.text: 他受够了那些嫉妒他才华的人总是诽谤他。

tr.text: Yeteneklerini kıskanan insanlar tarafından sürekli kötülenmekten bıkmıştı.

zh.text: 即使是不信天主教的人，也会把教皇视为象征性的领袖。

en: As the plane was approaching turbulence, the pilot asked the passengers aboard the plane to fasten their seat belts.

zh.text: 飞机接近气流颠簸区时，机长要求乘客们系好安全带。

ko.text: 비행기가 난기류에 진입하니까 기장이 승객들한테 안전벨트 매달라고 했어.

tr.text: Uçak türbülansa yaklaşırken, pilot yolculardan emniyet kemerlerini bağlamalarını istedi.

en: Jason was a taciturn individual, so it was always a real surprise when he said anything.

zh.text: 杰森这人话很少，所以他开口说话时总是让人很意外。

ko.text: 제이슨은 워낙 말수가 적은 애라서, 무슨 말이라도 하면 진짜 놀라웠어.

tr.text: Jason az konuşan biriydi, bu yüzden konuştuğunda her zaman büyük bir sürpriz olurdu.

en: The king was tired of his sycophants always praising him, so he sent them away.

zh.text: 国王听腻了那些马屁精的奉承，就把他们打发走了。

ko.text: 왕은 아첨꾼들이 맨날 찬양하는 게 지겨워서 그들을 멀리 보냈어.

tr.text: Kral, dalkavuklarının onu sürekli övmesinden bıkmıştı, bu yüzden onları gönderdi.

en: Spenser would not tell anyone his surreptitious plan to get back at his friends for pranking him.

zh.text: 斯宾塞不打算告诉任何人他那个报复整蛊他的朋友的秘密计划。

ko.text: 스펜서는 친구들이 자기한테 장난친 거 복수하려고 세운 비밀 계획을 아무한테도 말하지 않았어.

tr.text: Spenser, arkadaşlarının ona şaka yapmasının intikamını almak için gizli planını kimseye anlatmazdı.

en: If Spenser doesn't keep adding and translating sentences, the other contributors will surely surpass him.

zh.text: 如果斯宾塞不继续添加和翻译句子，其他贡献者肯定会超过他的。

tr.text: Spenser cümle eklemeye ve çevirmeye devam etmezse, diğer katılımcılar onu kesinlikle geçecektir.

en: His essay gave only a superficial analysis of the problem, so it was a real surprise to him when he got the highest grade in the class.

zh.text: 他的论文对问题的分析非常肤浅，所以他拿到班里最高分时感到很意外。

en: Food and drink were served in such profusion at the wedding that the bride and groom began to wonder if they should not have invited more guests.
